about_the_game:
Before Reading:
If you cannot understand somethings like PARADOX or TIME PARADOX. Just leave it as what the game setting.
What? Why? Ah... Cause IDK2!
Sincerely yours
Diedgod Trader

Game Setting
It's a game about a Girl that travelling around world for found out her memory and what she is.
They will meet different characters in their jounrney...
Someone knidness, but stuck in past memory. The Diedgod Witch .
Someone with a grave ideal, that known as impossible ideal. The Diedgod Knight .
Someone only wanna protect others, but others believes he is the God. The Diedgod Judge .
Someone wanna destroy the best city her made. The Diedgod Princess .
Someone... Uh...? Someone I wanna fly! . The Diedgod Angel .
And Someone human but still in this list. The Diedgod Master .
Annnnnddddd! The most strong and powerful person in this game.THAT MUST BE ME! The Diedgod Trader !

What? How strong I am? That must be the naming! See? Diedgod , Witch, Master... They're Coooooool ! Right?
Ah. Oops. What's the next... Oh, Yep, The Story!

Each Person here has their own Past , Present , and their Future dreams.
And our Main Character, CN. Enkidu. (Ohwaitthatthisnameisnotwritenbyme,someonejustusesomestrangeancientbabylonstoriesforherIDKY)
For their Past Life, They travel around for found out the memory, Slove the problems and questions.
They leap the time, know the Past and Future, to be a time king.... Oops, That's not word i should say.
But they choosed a Normal Life...
Sincerely yours
Diedgod Trader

Game Content
Thing here will be inside of Complete version.
※ EIGHT AREAS! Each one got nice nice characters and maps!
※ PUZZLES! Each area got tens of puzzles! They are hard...Ah... Really! Sometime it is very hard for standing in a plate!
※ COMPLEX BATTLE AND ACTIONS! Wha-waht? Why the Puzzle games got battle system? Uh. Umm.... Eh-he(IDK)
※ TIME PARADOX PUZZLE! Play Co-ops with yourself in the past!
※ GHOSTY MUSIC! Yah, I'm serious.
※ BIG WORLD SETTING! You see? Such as me got Many things need tell bout.
Yours
Diedgod Angel

Game Control
Wait, You can change the controls in-game! Why you just look the game controls in this shop page?
And when you playing you just say that hahaha,wait which key is shot? and just post it to groups or nets and Ah, it's that key and suddenly noticed that you can change controls in-game...
Alright, Alright, Just Look at this key. It's → key, You can use it for walking right.
Okay? And this is space key, You can use if for jump.
And, This key is the SHIFT. You can switch out your Ghost Body from your human body.
OK, you just learnt how to play The Ghost's Timepieces, let's try this HELLMODE PUZZLE now!
Yours
Diedgod Angel



Oh? Did I forgot about this?
There is no meanings of time for our Ghosts. Your Today canbe our Tomorrow, Your Tomorrow canbe our Yesterday, In sense.
But, Someone will not happy to accept this fact. Right?
Sincerely yours
Diedgod Trader

name: Ghost's Timepeices

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: An useful one
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A visible one
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A voiced one
  • Additional Notes: If game not run, It's my fault.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: *STRONGEST* one
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: *STRONGEST* one
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: *STRONGEST* one
  • Additional Notes: If don't know which should be used. Just Use the STRONGEST one.

short_description: "There is no Meanings of Time for Ghosts." A new world of ghost and human. A Mysterious Traveler leap the time, travel through the world, solve the puzzle, and chasing the Past...
